description: Try our easy to follow Banana & Berry Smoothie Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Banana & Berry Smoothie Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 ripe banana, peeled, sliced, and frozen

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the banana from the freezer and leave for about 20 minutes, or until the banana is just beginning to soften to the touch but the centre is still frozen. Transfer to a blender with the raspberries and yogurt, then purée until smooth, adding enough milk to get a thick, creamy consistency.
Transfer the mixture to a bowl and arrange the fruit and muesli on top.
